CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MarketAxess Holdings Inc operates leading electronic trading platforms delivering greater trading efficiency, a diversified pool of liquidity and cost savings to its clients across the global fixed-income markets. Aprroximately 1,900 institutional investor and broker-dealer firms uses the company's patented trading technology to trade U.S. high-grade bonds, U.S. high-yield bonds, emerging market debt, Eurobonds, municipal bonds, U.S. government bonds and other fixed-income securities.
